<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1633</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Feelings.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefühle.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sentiments.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentimentos.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sensibilità.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συναισθήματα.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sensaciones.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The aim of this lesson is - writing, using the Word and the Internet, develop the child's curiosity and imagination and expose him to different kinds of feelings.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">feelings</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ziel dieser Lektion ist - Schreiben mit dem Wort und 
dem Internet, entwickelt des die Neugier Kindes und die Phantasie und 
setzt ihn unterschiedlichen Arten von Gefühlen aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de cette leçon est - écriture, en utilisant le 
mot et l'Internet, développe la curiosité de l'enfant et 
l'imagination et l'expose à différents genres de sentiments.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O alvo desta lição é - escrita, usando a palavra e o 
Internet, desenvolve a curiosidade da criança e a imaginação e 
expõe-no aos tipos diferentes dos sentimentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questa lezione è - scrittura, usando la 
parola ed il Internet, sviluppa la curiosità del bambino e 
l'immaginazione e lo espone ai generi differenti di sensibilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο στόχος αυτού του μαθήματος είναι - γράψιμο, 
χρησιμοποιώντας το Word και το Διαδίκτυο, αναπτύσσει την 
περιέργεια του παιδιού και τη φαντασία και τον εκθέτει στα 
διαφορετικά είδη συναισθημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La puntería de esta lección es - escritura, usando la 
palabra y el Internet, desarrolla la curiosidad del niño y la 
imaginación y lo expone a diversas clases de sensaciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefühle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sentiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inglês de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">efl inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
